description: Explore the concept of blockchain forks, including their types, mechanics, and impacts on the blockchain ecosystem. Delve into examples like Bitcoin Cash and Segregated Witness, and understand the implications, challenges, and controversies surrounding forks in blockchain technology.
keywords: blockchain forks, hard forks, soft forks, Bitcoin, Bitcoin Cash, Segregated Witness, blockchain technology, cryptocurrency, scalability, security, governance, consensus mechanisms
title: Understanding Blockchain Forks: A Detailed Overview
